comment.caption: Mary Jane Truman and visitors at Grandview farm
comment.note: One of a series of photos from Mary Jane Truman's Christmas Album, 1906. Mary Jane Truman (left) seated on a fence on the Grandview farm in a dark skirt, with four unidentified young women. Caption says "The Visitors Are On the Fence." From: Copied from photos lent to the Truman Library by Martha Ann Swoyer, daughter of Vivian Truman.
